modal: I created a custom theme for the Velvet Trumpet website using Wordpress CMS. Integrating SASS and grunt to increase workflow.

I was asked by Emdad at 3DUX to develop a responsive website and integrate it into a Wordpress theme with a database so he was able to create content for his portfolio of work. The content of his portfolio needed to be hidden behind a user system so that only people with granted privileges could access the confidential portfolio information.
I created the end roller using After Effects for Chris Morris' directorial debut Four Lions.
I used Wordpress CMS to create a basic theme for ID Creative Media's website.
